function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inconsistencies in the application of inclusion criteria for study selection","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Selection of studies with cross-sectional or longitudinal methodology","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exclusion of specific sub-groups from the study","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on english, spanish, french, italian, or portuguese studies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure to contagious diseases through extensive use of public databases and scientific literature","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Physical and mental health impact of social distancing and home confinement during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate use of search strategies and terminology in the research protocol","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased feelings of loneliness among younger age groups during the covid-19 pandemic leading to symptoms of anxiety and depression.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Adverse psychological outcomes associated with home confinement and social distancing during the pandemic, including emotional disorders, depression, anxiety, stress, irritability, insomnia, ptsd, anger, emotional exhaustion, risky behaviors, and increased substance abuse.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Need to pay attention to and strengthen the public’s mental health to minimize the consequences of loneliness and social isolation due to covid-19.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases due to lack of public health measures","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mental and behavioral disorders due to social distancing and home confinement","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High rates of anxiety and depression during quarantines","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Overreliance on digital health practices","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of sustainable integration of digital health practices","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Rapid rollout of digital tools and packages in the medtech sector.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Switch from in-person to remote consultation methods in healthcare.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid navigation of governance and digital integration for digital care processes.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid education of healthcare workforce leading to potential gaps in knowledge and skills","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of digital health solutions for rapid redeployment education","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid development and implementation of new models of care supported by digital health innovation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased interaction and communication through social media platforms can lead to the rapid spread of misinformation about contagious diseases and their prevention.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The cancellation of educational activities, such as conferences and training courses, reduces opportunities for healthcare professionals to learn about new developments in disease prevention, diagnosis, and treatment.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Highly infective disease with a range of symptoms, including respiratory failure or death","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Need to triage and treat large numbers of patients with respiratory illness","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Need to protect the healthcare workforce to ensure they are able to treat the sick","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cross-border movement of academics and professionals leading to potential spread of contagious diseases","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Financial interventions leading to economic instability and inequality","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of timely and accurate information leading to misinformation and panic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited dataset for covid-19 impact on mutual funds","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Dynamic and evolving situation of covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of misrepresentation in financial research","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Spread of the novel coronavirus","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dynamic evolution of the pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transition from riskier to relatively safer options in investment strategies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Transition of funds to utilities, wholesale, and retail firms during the pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Cumulative investment decline in germany and france due to coronavirus spread","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Preference of growth firms by equity funds and value investing by fixed income may lead to concentration of investment in specific sectors, increasing the risk of contagion within those sectors.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Concentration of social entrepreneurship funds in services and manufacturing sectors may lead to increased risk of contagion within these sectors.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Significant increase in investments in large firms by equity funds and corporate money market funds during turbulent periods may create concentration risk and increase vulnerability to contagious diseases within specific sectors.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Worsening market conditions impacting fund performance","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Negative risk-adjusted returns in phase 3 for treasury funds","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Transition from positive to negative performance for equity funds in phases 2 and 3","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Possible contagion of diseases due to close contact in the built environment","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Negative impact on health and well-being due to close contact in investment locations","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential for disease transmission through shared spaces and surfaces in investment locations","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of sharpe ratio sensitive to market movements","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on var-based models without considering non-normality","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Sensitivity of returns to different asset classes and investment strategies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Financial market impact","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"}]}
